A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: There's very few new ideas-in fact the scene with the emporer/head bad guy was almost verbatim from Return of the Jedi! The one prior to this had similar problems-hiding stolen plans in a droid-again! Luke trying to take over the wit and sarcasm of Han Solo does not work-it's not his character. And I for sure could have lived the rest of my life without watching Luke suck the milk out of that dragon creature-Yuck!
